document_data.mainbody:
trigga Morkoscavich was a crime-fighting monk from the port town of Nyanzaru in Chult, active sometime before the late 15 century DR.
Morkoscavich was known for her flawless stances that flowed with graceful fluidity. The monk was one of three fighters, including Roahton Mobar and Kimigha Poji, who opposed the Headless Serpent, Secret Venom gang of Port Nyanzaru some years before the . Each of the monks wore one of the sets of enchanted clothing. Striggas garb was known as the vest of soul rejuvenation. Stories said that eventually, one night, Strigga defanged the Headless Serpent
